metadata: (info { (description "Dablo is a word used by the Sámi people for capturing games. This version was played on a 7x7 board in Frostviken, Sweden.") (rules "7x7 lines, forming a grid. Diagonals in each square. 39 pieces per payer, including a prince and a king for each player. Players can agree at the beginning of the game that if a king is captured, the game ends.") (source "DLP evidence.") (id "1231") (version "1.3.9") (classification "board/war/leaping/lines/reconstruction/pending") (credit "Eric Piette") } ) (recon { (concept "NumStartComponents" 78) })
